attributes.action: insist that the delivery of Ratko Mladic to the ICTY is an essential precondition for the resumption of negotiations with Serbia on a Stabilisation and Association Agreement with the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There must be no weakening in the requirement for Serbia to achieve "concrete results" in apprehending General Ratko Mladic, indicted by the International Criminal Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia on charges of genocide in Bosnia, before the European Union resumes negotiations leading towards Serbia's membership of the E.U.
